title: Paul Girardot
body:
Paul Girardot started his career as an Art Director at J Walter Thompson, where he spent six years working across the agencies accounts.

He then moved to other well known Advertising agencies such as Doyle Dane Bernbach and the Lowe Howard-Spink group before setting up his own agency in October 1991. The agency, Girardot, has worked for many famous financial brands and continues to grow.
